sect1.title: Creating the ${CLFS}/tools Directory
sect1.para: All programs compiled in will be installed under ${CLFS}/tools to keep them separate from the programs compiled in . The programs compiled here are temporary tools and will not be a part of the final CLFS system. By keeping these programs in a separate directory, they can easily be discarded later after their use. This also prevents these programs from ending up in the host production directories (easy to do by accident in ).
